attributes.action: Take all reasonable steps to ensure that Richard Brunstrom, Chief Constable of North Wales Police, is removed from his position
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr. Brunstrom's conduct has repeatedly and vividly demonstrated he is intellectually, culturally and professionally incapable of connecting with the people with whose safety he is entrusted. His constant pursuit of his own self-aggrandisment and political agenda has rendered him totally unsuitable for his current position and the only course of action compatible with the North Wales Constabulary's obligations to its community is his immediate dismissal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
